properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR AUTHOR LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK WHERE AUTHOR LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK B WHERE CATEGORY_ID IN(SELECT C.CATEGORY_ID FROM B_CATEGORY C JOIN B_CATEGORY D ON(C.REF_ID = D.CATEGORY_ID) WHERE C.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR D.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID) WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = ? AND BOOK_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR AUTHOR LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID) WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = ? AND BOOK_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID) WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = ? AND AUTHOR LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK B JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID) WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = ? AND CATEGORY_ID IN(SELECT C.CATEGORY_ID FROM B_CATEGORY C JOIN B_CATEGORY D ON(C.REF_ID = D.CATEGORY_ID) WHERE C.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR D.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%')

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOOK_ID , BOOK_NAME , CATEGORY_ID , CATEGORY_NAME , AUTHOR , EDITOR , PUBLICATION_DATE , PUBLISHER , SALE_PRICE , BOOK_IMG , STAR_SCORE , AVG_SCORE FROM BOOK JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID)) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM BOOK JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID) GROUP BY CATEGORY_NAME
SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM BOOK JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID) WHERE BOOK_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR AUTHOR LIKE '%' || ? || '%' GROUP BY CATEGORY_NAME

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOOK_ID , BOOK_NAME , CATEGORY_ID , CATEGORY_NAME , AUTHOR , EDITOR , PUBLICATION_DATE , PUBLISHER , SALE_PRICE , BOOK_IMG , STAR_SCORE , AVG_SCORE FROM BOOK JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID) WHERE STAR_SCORE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY STAR_SCORE DESC NULLS LAST) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? SELECT BOOK_ID , BOOK_NAME , CATEGORY_ID , CATEGORY_NAME , USER_NO , AUTHOR , EDITOR , PUBLICATION_DATE , PUBLISHER , PRICE , STOCK , SALE_RATE , SALE_PRICE , BOOK_INTRO , BOOK_URL , FILE_PATH , AUTHOR_INTRO , BOOK_IMG , STAR_SCORE , AVG_SCORE FROM BOOK JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID) WHERE BOOK_ID = ?
SELECT REVIEW_NO , BOOK_ID , USER_NO , USER_ID , CREATE_DATE , CONTENT , RATING , REF_NO FROM B_REVIEW JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE BOOK_ID = ?
